title: How Do You Decide Which Firefox Add-ons to Keep or Remove?
content:
Hey everyone,

I’ve been customizing Firefox with a lot of add-ons lately — privacy tools, productivity helpers, tab managers, etc.

Sometimes I get overwhelmed trying to decide which ones to keep or disable. Recently, I started using a small online random decision tool — https://easydecisionmaker-us.com/ 

— to help me “let chance decide” when I can’t make up my mind between two good options.

It’s been surprisingly fun and effective!

How do you all decide which extensions stay and which ones go? Do you have a system or just rely on trial and error?
creator: executordelta933

title: How Do You Decide Which Firefox Add-ons to Keep or Remove?

It’s been surprisingly fun and effective!

title: login status always saved
content:
One of the recent updates changed Firefox's behaviour. It now remembers my login status to various sites when I close the browser. For example, if I was logged in to facebook when I closed the browser, I will be logged in when I open the browser and navigate to facebook.com. This was not the case until very recently (a few weeks at most). Is there a way to change this?

I have strict privacy settings, and Firefox should delete all cookies when it is closed. There are no 'exceptions'. I have 'always use private mode' checked for history. Also: I haven't changed any settings recently - something changed in Firefox.

Any advice? Thank you.
creator: noambergman

title: Profiles update not working
content:
Hello.

After the recent update that added profiles to Firefox I have gotten them working on my personal computer but not on my work pc.

The option for creating profiles showed up once when launching the browser but I had to dismiss it at the time. Now I can't find the option to create profiles any more, I have followed the guides that mozilla have put out but the option physically is not there.

I have also tried reinstalling Firefox but that also did not work.

what do?

Thanks.

title: vypršení platnosti certifikátu pro server prekvapeni.kafe cz
content:
Webové stránky prokazují svou totožnost pomocí certifikátů, které mají přesně stanovenou dobu platnosti. Platnost certifikátu pro server prekvapeni.kafe.cz vypršela 4. 11. 2025.

Kód chyby: SEC_ERROR_EXPIRED_CERTIFICATE

Zobrazit certifikát 

Nemohu se dostat na stránky Překvapení , nevím co mám udělat. Děkuji Lopraisová
